title: How to Get to a Google Maps Location Through a Wikipedia Geohack

steps.headline: Go to a Wikipedia article about a landmark.
Expect to arrive at the GeoHack.
steps.description: Click on the link to Google Maps.

steps.headline: Expect to arrive at Google Maps.
steps.description: The link transported you to the coordinate location.

steps.headline: Relax and take in the street view!

text: Go to a Wikipedia article about a landmark. For example, a transmission tower. Click on the coordinates.  Expect to arrive at the GeoHack. Click on the link to Google Maps. Expect to arrive at Google Maps. The link transported you to the coordinate location. Relax and take in the street view!
sentences: Go to a Wikipedia article about a landmark.
Expect to arrive at the GeoHack.
Click on the link to Google Maps.
Expect to arrive at Google Maps.
The link transported you to the coordinate location.
Relax and take in the street view!
